item.title: How to host your Hugo website on Github Pages?
item.description: Here is the step by step guide to host your Hugo website on Github Pages.

item.title: Create your first Hugo website locally on Windows
item.description: This article explains how to create your first web site on Windows using Hugo.

item.title: From Wordpress to Hugo website
item.description: Why I migrated from Wordpress to Hugo website. Pros and cons.

item.title: How to embed you GitHub code to Hugo using a shortcode?
item.description: This article explains how to embed your GitHub code in your Hugo website using a shortcode.

item.title: Using Hugo page bundles
item.description: Page bundles are an optional way to organize page resources within Hugo. You can opt-in to using page bundles in Hugo Clarity with `usePageBundles` in your site configuration --- or in a page's front matter.
